embed.description:
## Map
The Map is where each run takes place. The player travels via a path of events across different stages. Each stage has two paths that connect a handful of events, ending with a Boss or Miniboss. The player chooses one path to follow, and visits each event on that path. 
## Zones
As players play through a run, they will pass through three zones on the map. Each zone varies the number of events encountered as well as different map decor and battle background. There are no zone-specific events, but some events are more likely to show up earlier/later in a run. 
**Snowdwell and Tundra**
The players begin the journey by leaving Snowdwell and into the snowy lands beyond. Players will encounter 3-4 events between battles in this zone. These areas are depicted as snow-covered forests and plains with scattered rocks and distant mountain ranges. 
**Ice Caves**
After beating the first boss, players move into the Ice Caves. In the Ice Caves, players will find 3-4 map events between battles. Here, one can find caves populated with massive ice stalagmites and stalactites with various creatures and debris frozen over. 
**Frostlands**
The areas beyond the second boss are known as the Frostlands. Players can expect to visit 1-2 events between battles, and it is here the player can find and fight the Eye of the Storm. This region has huge purple Frost formations and leftover equipment.
## Events

fields.name: Frozen Travellers
fields.value: Lets you choose 1 of 3 randomly selected Companions to add to your deck.

fields.name: Treasure Chest
fields.value: Lets you choose 1 of 3 randomly selected Items or Clunkers

fields.name: Large Treasure Chest
fields.value: Lets you choose 1 of 4 randomly selected Items or Clunkers. ||Only appears if the player has the Titan Bell active.||

fields.name: Charm Dispenser
fields.value: Gives the player a random charm

fields.name: Gnome Traveller
fields.value: Displays 3 random items or clunkers. The player can pick up any number of them, adding 1 junk to the player's deck in addition to the chosen card. (unlocked at Icebreaker Cabin)

fields.name: Muncher
fields.value: Allows the player to remove up to 2 cards in their deck, improving consistency

fields.name: Shade Sculptor
fields.value: Allows the player to duplicate any item or clunker in their deck. The copied card retains all charms, but not crowns (unlocked at Icebreaker Cabin)

fields.name: The Woolly Snail
fields.value: Allows the player to buy: one of 4 items with 1 of them being at a 50% sale, up to 3 random charms (costing 50, 70 and 90 bling respectively) or a crown for 80 bling

fields.name: Charm Merchant
fields.value: Displays 3 charms for sale and a random card with a random charm attached to it. (unlocked at Icebreaker Cabin)

embed.title: Map
